channel.title: No HEV Suit Voice ? It Worked Fine Last Time...
channel.description:
well, i've installed a bunch of mods, as i usually do, though last time when i had BM installed the suit voice worked fine... i just reinstalled it a few days ago (i screwed around with mods a bit too much and things just got worse and worse, though now everything works as i want it)except that, i even tried throwing grenades at myself, with subtitles on, the stuff that the suit would normally say shows up just fine, but no voice... i've validated the "Source SDK Base 2007" twice... nothin'... and they used to work fine... what am i missing here ?
If anyone has the wav files and knows where they should be stored (or where i should look for them) please post a link...
Thanks :smiley:

item.title: No HEV Suit Voice ? It Worked Fine Last Time...
item.dc:creator: Alex_Wolfenstein97
item.description:
well, i’ve installed a bunch of mods, as i usually do, though last time when i had BM installed the suit voice worked fine… i just reinstalled it a few days ago (i screwed around with mods a bit too much and things just got worse and worse, though now everything works as i want it)except that, i even tried throwing grenades at myself, with subtitles on, the stuff that the suit would normally say shows up just fine, but no voice… i’ve validated the “Source SDK Base 2007” twice… nothin’… and they used to work fine… what am i missing here ?

If anyone has the wav files and knows where they should be stored (or where i should look for them) please post a link…

Thanks
